document.full_text: a "soft restructuring" of greece's sovereign debt is not on the cards, european central bank governing council member ewald nowotny told austrian radio, insisting greece take the lead on shoring up its finances.
document.title: soft restructuring for greece not on cards: nowotny
lines_and_colors: a "soft restructuring" of greece's sovereign debt is not on the cards, european central bank governing council member ewald nowotny told austrian radio, insisting greece take the lead on shoring up its finances.
